(1996), Crossroads (1986), Eddie and the Cruisers (1983), The Five Heartbeats (1991), My Dinner with Jimi (2003), Sugar Town (1999), The Wedding Weekend (2006), Why Do Fools Fall in Love (1998), A Star Is Born (1976), One-Trick Pony (1980)

Story: An aspiring singer, Denise Waverly/Edna Buxton, sacrifices her own singing career to write hit songs that launch the careers of other singers. The film follows her life from her first break, through the pain of rejection from the recording industry and a bad marriage, to her final triumph in realizing her dream to record her own hit album.
